attributes.action: concentrate on giving the troops in Afghanistan the equipment they need instead of simply sending more troops out there.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The troops in Afghanistan are operating on extremely stretched resources and need more support from equipment and supplies.

You cannot just throw people at this problem hoping it will go away. Give them the equipment they need now or pull them out!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
